a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Global injuries from natural disasters, All natural disasters, 1900 to 2019
Global number of people injured from natural disaster events. This is defined as "people suffering from physical
injuries, trauma or an illness requiring immediate medical assistance as a direct result of a disaster."
Source: EMDAT (2020): OFDA/CRED International Disaster Database, Université catholique de Louvain – Brussels – Belgium
